titleStmt.title: The secretes of the reuerende Maister Alexis of Piemount Containyng excellent remedies against diuers diseases, woundes, and other accidents, with the manner to make distillations, parfumes, confitures, diynges, colours, fusions and meltynges. ... Translated out of Frenche into Englishe, by Wyllyam Warde.
Secreti. Part 1. English
titleStmt.author: Ruscelli, Girolamo, d. ca. 1565.
Ward, William, 1534-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Kingstone for Nicolas Inglande, dwellinge in Poules churchyarde,

notesStmt.note: A translation of part 1 of a French version of: Ruscelli, Girolamo. De' secreti del R.D. Alessio Piemontese.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
